meanings.definition: A type of illustration or graphic design created using only lines.
meanings.sent1: The artist's linecut of a tree was simple yet detailed.
meanings.sent2: I love how the linecut of the city skyline captures the essence of urban life.
meanings.sent3: The linecut of the cat wearing sunglasses made me chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her linecut of the waves crashing on the shore was like a dance frozen in time.
meanings.sent5: The linecut of the flower was so precise, it looked like a delicate lace pattern.

meanings.definition: To create an illustration or graphic design using only lines.
meanings.sent1: She decided to linecut the portrait of her dog for her art project.
meanings.sent2: The artist linecut the logo for the company's new product.
meanings.sent3: I linecut a doodle of a smiling sun during the meeting.
meanings.sent4: His skill in linecutting brought life to the characters on the page.
meanings.sent5: The students were excited to linecut their own designs in the workshop.
